title: RIOT FIX YOUR PROFILE BUG.
body: i cant see my profile or others sometimes. i click it and it doesnt let me. please fix it

replies.body:
Bump.  Same issue here and I'm tired of logging out and back in over and over.  Not to mention I can't look at the profiles of the people I just played with because the list wipes if I log out.  It's really making me mad...

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/aF3sMjfB-client-view-profile-not-working

Here's my original post on this.  Figured I'd gather here for numbers.

I've come across probably the same bug. After attempting to view no more then 2 people's profiles from the "recently played" tab in the Friends menu, I am then unable to view more, or even my own, having to relog in order to view my own profile, edit masteries, etc. Does not fix itself after a new game, only relogging.
